intro: Aneilema sacleuxii, commonly known as the African violet, is a flowering plant native to tropical Africa. It belongs to the family Gesneriaceae and is characterized by its vibrant, showy flowers that come in a variety of colors. The plant typically has thick, fleshy leaves that help it retain moisture in its natural habitat. It is often cultivated as a houseplant due to its ornamental value and relatively easy care requirements. Aneilema sacleuxii thrives in bright, indirect light and well-draining soil.
